articles.description: The football world is mourning the death of Liverpool and Portugal forward Diogo Jota's death aged 28 in a car crash.
articles.title: Diogo Jota: Liverpool forward's death leaves football world in shock and grief

articles.description: England's top order is blown away after Shubman Gill's 267 to leave the hosts requiring their most unlikely turnaround yet under Ben Stokes.
articles.title: England vs India: Shubman Gill hits 267 before wickets give tourists control

articles.description: Listen to BBC Radio 5 Live Sport commentary and follow live text commentary as Spain take on Portugal in the UEFA Women's Euro.
articles.title: Spain vs Portugal LIVE: Women's Euro 2025 line-ups, kick-off time & updates

articles.description: Seven-time champion Novak Djokovic beats Dan Evans in what could be the British veteran's final appearance on Wimbledon's Centre Court.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Novak Djokovic outclasses Dan Evans, Jack Pinnington Jones beaten by Flavio Cobolli

articles.description: Alex Albon tells BBC Sport that having Carlos Sainz as a team-mate gives him "a benchmark which a lot of the paddock can reference".
articles.title: Alex Albon on having Carlos Sainz as a benchmark and Williams' ambitions over next few years

articles.description: Liverpool say they are "devastated" by the "unimaginable loss" of their Portuguese forward Diogo Jota, who has died in a car crash.
articles.title: Diogo Jota: Liverpool 'devastated' by death of forward in car crash

articles.description: Australia wickets tumble either side of a century stand between Beau Webster and Alex Carey on the opening day of the second Test.
articles.title: West Indies v Australia: Tourists bowled out for 286 in Grenada Test

articles.description: Owen Farrell's call-up by father Andy will not only dominate the headlines, but also bring a new sharpness to the British and Irish Lions' preparations for the Wallabies, writes Mike Henson.
articles.title: Owen Farrell: British and Irish Lions call-up 'adds more intensity to Australia tour'

articles.description: Tadej Pogacar will begin this year's Tour de France as the strong favourite to win cycling's greatest race for a fourth time - but will anyone stop him?
articles.title: Tour de France 2025: Tadej Pogacar is chasing a fourth win - who are his main rivals?

articles.description: American Ben Shelton is left furious when play in his second-round encounter with Rinky Hijikata at Wimbledon is suspended because of bad light when he was about to serve for the match.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Ben Shelton fumes as play suspended while serving for match
